attributes.action: Ban disrespectful videos about the Holy Prophet Muhammad PBUH on YouTube.
attributes.additional_details: Recently a video called ' The Innocent Prophet ' have been uploaded on YouTube where wrong and disrespectful language have been used against the Holy Prophet Muhammad PBUH and it's very hurtful for the British Muslims. Please ban these videos on YouTube. The link of that video and other disrespectful videos are:
attributes.background: Disrespectful  vidoes of Holy Prophet Muhammad PBUH have been uploaded on youtube in which they are trying to spread the wrong information to defame Islam as a religion and the personality of Holy Prophet Muhammad PBUH. We request the UK parliament to ban all these videos on YouTube.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of YouTube, not the UK Government and Parliament. 

You could start a new petition about something that the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for.
